definitions.definition: The region of the field between the infield and the outer fence.
examples: He hit a long fly ball to the outfield in the gap to left.

definitions.definition: The region of the field roughly outside of the infield or the wicket-keeper , slips , gully , point , cover , mid off , mid on , midwicket and square leg .
The area outside a racetrack or running track .
Arable land continually cropped without being manured .
Any open field at a distance from the farmsteading .

main_definition: ( baseball , softball ) The region of the field between the infield and the outer fence.
secondary_definitions: ( cricket ) The region of the field roughly outside of the infield or the wicket-keeper , slips , gully , point , cover , mid off , mid on , midwicket and square leg .
The area outside a racetrack or running track .
( Scotland , agriculture ) Arable land continually cropped without being manured .
( Scotland , agriculture ) Any open field at a distance from the farmsteading .
